knimeNode.name: Column Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Takes a data table and returns an empty data table with only the selected columns.

intro.p: Takes a data table and returns an empty data table with only the selected columns. The selection can also be controlled from a quickfrom (WebPortal).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If the setting should be hidden in the wizard execution.
If the setting should be hidden in the sub node dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution).
The columns that are selected by default.

ports.outPort: Table containing the selected columns and no rows.
